# Focus Events Focus events are triggered when elements gain or lose focus. ## Event Types - **on-focus**: Triggered when element gains focus - **on-blur**: Triggered when element loses focus ## Example `view .html [ field "Focus me..." [ on-focus [print "Field focused"] on-blur [print "Field blurred"] ] ]` ## Components Supporting Focus Events - field - input - textarea - select ## Use Cases - Validation on blur - Showing/hiding help text - Tracking user activity - Implementing keyboard navigation ## See Also - [Event Overview](/wiki/core/events/event-overview/) - Introduction to events - [Input Events](/wiki/core/events/input-events/) - Input event handling
